members.name: station_list
members.description: Search weather stations information by country or geo information.

params.name: country
params.description:
The country to search for. For example: US. Refer to ftp://ftp.ncdc.noaa.gov/pub/data/noaa/country-list.txt
 (required)

params.name: country
params.description:
The country to search for. For example: US. Refer to ftp://ftp.ncdc.noaa.gov/pub/data/noaa/country-list.txt
 (required)

params.name: start_dt
params.description: The optional start date for the query (required)

params.name: end_dt
params.description: The optional end date for the query (required)

params.name: sample_rate
params.description:
The optional,
'd': daily summary of weather (default),
'w': weekly summary of weather, 
'm': monthly summary of weather          
 (required)

params.name: fields
params.description: The optional end date for the query (required)

members.name: weather_stations
members.description: Search weather data by station Id and date range.

params.name: start_dt
params.description: The optional start date for the query (required)

params.name: end_dt
params.description: The optional end date for the query (required)

params.name: fields
params.description: The optional, fields for the query (required)

params.name: sample_rate
params.description:
The optional,

'w': weekly summary of weather, 
'm': monthly summary of weather
 (required)

ret.description: Search weather data by stations Id
